channel.title: [PI] How do I do this?
channel.description: Ok, to my basic understanding, which is very amateurish, sprites are used in game to display on the screen, I got that part, but, how do I add sprites? and where do i put all of them to be used in game a certain way? I'm not gonna post this server on the web, I just want to learn coding off of it.

item.title: [PI] How do I do this?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

Get Blitz:

to add a New item you will first need to add the model in the models or raw folder in cache, then you will need to add the ints in itemdef.java which basically add it to the game. Then you add it in item.java server sided that you can change the power of the item and bonuses etc.

I made a new thread on my progress that I’ve had go check that out and please do help me from there. It should be in the same place,

END THIS THREAD.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] How do I do this?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

to add a New item you will first need to add the model in the models or raw folder in cache, then you will need to add the ints in itemdef.java which basically add it to the game. Then you add it in item.java server sided that you can change the power of the item and bonuses etc.

item.title: [PI] How do I do this?
item.dc:creator: @tyyy9 tyyy9
item.description:
@tyyy9 wrote:

No, like for example, in my server I do have god swords, they are put in the game somehow, but I want to insert some dragon armor, how would I do that? I do understand most java so I just need to figure out what to do in my server…
